contents.text:
with the Heal Pool summons a cake marked with a colored candle corresponding to your teams color.

 Every 0.5s the Heal Pool will reduce a random teammate within the marked area's knockback percentage by 2%.

Notice: 
 Attempting to use it whenever you're not on the ground will result in failure, but you may keep the item.

When used by a Lone Wolf the Heal Pool will heal all Lone Wolfs, even though they are not your allies.
